member.name: T:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphAuth
member.summary: Data to perform authorization/authentication flows for connecting accounts from application to Health Graph.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphAuth.ClientID
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for a registered application.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphAuth.ClientSecret
member.summary: Gets or sets the secret for a registered application.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphAuth.RedirectUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the page where the Health Graph API should redirect the user after accepting or denying the access request.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphAuth.State
member.summary: Gets or sets a parameter that represents an meaningful state for the application.
member.remarks: The authorization endpoint will return this value when responding to application authorization request.

member.name: T:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphAuthErrorObject
member.summary: Simple error object for authorization/authentication flows.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphAuthErrorObject.Error
member.summary: Gets or sets the error occurred.

member.name: T:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphAuthResult
member.summary: Result object for authorization/authentication flows.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphAuthResult.StatusCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP response status code.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphAuthResult.ContentString
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP response content representation as string.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphAuthResult.Status
member.summary: Gets or sets flow status.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphAuthResult.ErrorCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the error code (if = ).

member.name: T:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphAuthStatus
member.summary: Represents the authorization/authentication flow status.

member.name: F:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphAuthStatus.None
member.summary: None status (nothing to handle).

member.name: F:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphAuthStatus.Error
member.summary: An error has occurred (handled).

member.name: F:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphAuthStatus.Auhtorized
member.summary: The user authorized the application to access its Runkeeper data (handled).

member.name: T:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphToken
member.summary: Token to access Health Graph API.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphToken.AccessToken
member.summary: Access token to authenticate to Health Graph API.
member.remarks: This string uniquely identifies the association of the application to the user's Health Graph/Runkeeper account.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphToken.TokenType
member.summary: Authorization type: "Bearer" in this case.

member.name: T:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphUser
member.summary: Represents a user resource which identifies the available resources for a specific user and the URIs for accessing them.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphUser.UserID
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique ID for the user.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphUser.Profile
member.summary: Gets or sets the URI of the user profile resource.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphUser.Settings
member.summary: Gets or sets the URI of the sharing and display settings resource.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphUser.FitnessActivities
member.summary: Gets or sets the URI of the first page of the fitness activity feed.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphUser.StrengthTrainingActivities
member.summary: Gets or sets the URI of the first page of the strength training activity feed.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphUser.BackgroundActivities
member.summary: Gets or sets the URI of the first page of the background activity feed.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphUser.Sleep
member.summary: Gets or sets the URI of the first page of the sleep feed.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphUser.Nutrition
member.summary: Gets or sets the URI of the first page of the nutrition feed.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphUser.Weight
member.summary: Gets or sets the URI of the first page of the weight measurement feed.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphUser.GeneralMeasurements
member.summary: Gets or sets the URI of the first page of the general measurements feed.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphUser.Diabetes
member.summary: Gets or sets the URI of the first page of the diabetes measurements feed.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphUser.Records
member.summary: Gets or sets the URI of the personal records resource.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphUser.Team
member.summary: Gets or sets the URI of the friends (formerly known as the "street team") resource.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.HealthGraphUser.ChangeLog
member.summary: Gets or sets the URI of the change log resource.

member.name: T:HealthGraphAPI.IHealthGraphClient
member.summary: Health Graph REST client.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.IHealthGraphClient.Auth
member.summary: Gets the data to perform authorization/authentication flows for connecting accounts from application to Health Graph.

member.name: P:HealthGraphAPI.IHealthGraphClient.Token
member.summary: Gets the token that allows the user/application to access to Health Graph.

member.name: M:HealthGraphAPI.IHealthGraphClient.BuildAuthorizeUri
member.summary: Builds the authorization URL to start the flow for connecting account from application to Health Graph.
member.returns: The authorization URL to start the flow for connecting account from application to Health Graph.

member.name: M:HealthGraphAPI.IHealthGraphClient.HandleAuthorization(System.Uri)
member.summary: Handles the authorize/de-authorize flow to access to Health Graph.

member.name: M:HealthGraphAPI.IHealthGraphClient.HandleAuthorizationAsync(System.Uri)
member.summary: Handles the authorize/de-authorize flow to access to Health Graph.

member.name: M:HealthGraphAPI.IHealthGraphClient.ReadUser
member.summary: Reads the user resource.
member.returns: An instance of with user resource information.

member.name: M:HealthGraphAPI.IHealthGraphClient.ReadUserAsync
member.summary: Reads the user resource.
member.returns: An instance of with user resource information.
